name: Linky
title: lin.ky
shortDescription: Linky is a versatile link-in-bio tool designed to enhance online presence for individuals and brands. It integrates seamlessly with various platforms, allowing users to display live stats, photos, videos, and more. The drag-and-drop builder makes it easy to create and customize pages that look great on both mobile and desktop. Ideal for influencers, marketers, and content creators, Linky simplifies content aggregation and page management, making it a go-to for engaging audience interaction.
pros: Customizable design for mobile and desktop

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Linktree
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular link-in-bio tool with similar features.
